meanings.sent1: She practiced her speech reiteratively to ensure she remembered it well.
meanings.sent2: He checked the document reiteratively to catch any errors.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed reiteratively until it got the attention it wanted.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the clock ticking reiteratively filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reiteratively reminded the students to study for the upcoming test.

meanings.definition: In a manner that involves repetition or reiteration
meanings.sent1: The song played reiteratively on the radio throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: She reiteratively asked for clarification on the assignment instructions.
meanings.sent3: The toddler reiteratively asked 'why?' to every answer given.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashed reiteratively against the shore, creating a calming rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The computer program reiteratively displayed the same error message.
